valid: For the period 06:00 (UTC) on Tue 28 Oct 2025 to 06:00 (UTC) on Wed 29 Oct 2025
general_synopsis: Low Rockall 989 moving rather quickly eastwards, losing its identity by midnight tonight. New low expected Rockall 984 by same time
